3. Which of the following statements is true for Python lists?
   a) Lists are immutable
   b) Lists can contain elements of different data types
   c) Lists are always sorted in ascending order
   d) Lists can only store numeric values', '
Options:
a) Lists are immutable
   b) Lists can contain elements of different data types
   c) Lists are always sorted in ascending order
   d) Lists can only store numeric values', '
